text: Xudo ʙa va'dae, ki ʙo sumo nihoda ʙud, vafo kard, on goh ki ʙa amri U dusmanro mekusted. Va cun ƣanimatero, ki havasi onro dar sar dosted, ʙa sumo nison dod, susti karded va dar on amr ʙa nizo' pardoxted va nofarmoni varzided. Ba'ze xostori dunjo suded va ʙa'ze xostsri oxirat. Sipas to sumoro ʙa ʙaloe muʙtalo kunad, ʙa gurextan vodost! Inak sumoro ʙiʙaxsid, ki Uro ʙa mu'minon ʙaxsoisest
